name: Elearnify Widget
author: Francesco Bux

sections.description:
This plugin embeds the Elearnify widget associated to your whitelabel direclty into you WordPress installation.

In order to use it you need to obtain the whitelabel identifier for the widget, which is available in your app.elearnify.it backend.

For testing purposes the identifier 5db328b5-1510-465b-a250-66139d340b58 can be used.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Place the widget by including it on one or more of your pages. Provide your whitelabel identifier in order to render courses associated to your platform.
sections.faq:
How do I get a Whitelebel Identifier

Register upon elearnify.it or contact lifelearning.it
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First version

1.5

  • Fixing missing widget

1.6

  • Adding support for course selection

1.9

  • Adding support for optional lead modal
